model.playlistmanager

Class BasicPlaylistManager<X>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.playlistmanager.BasicPlaylistManager<X>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlaylistManager<X>

    public class BasicPlaylistManager<X>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaylistManager<X>
    This class represents a basic playlist manager. the classic strategy is the default strategy used for select song from the playlist
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini
    See Also:
    PlaylistManager
